name: test_e2e_with_logs[746_WAF_PARAM_001]
description:

|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `WAF_PARAM_001` |
| **Name** | Parameter fragmentation bypass |
| **Category** | WAF_BYPASS |
| **Subcategory** | null_byte_split |
| **Severity** | `HIGH` |
